pullrequest.title: Make non-editable background models white in model editor

content.raw:
made changes to turn planes other than the ground plane white. ce8f661

plastic cup uses `Gazebo/GreyTransparent` material, and it looks like it is not working properly in general. It should be transparent in simulation mode, not dark grey, will ticket an issue for this
content.html:
made changes to turn planes other than the ground plane white. ce8f661

plastic cup uses Gazebo/GreyTransparent material, and it looks like it is not working properly in general. It should be transparent in simulation mode, not dark grey, will ticket an issue for this
